title: "An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again."
body:
The error is in the title, I've tried forcing repatch through hextech repair tool but nothing is budging.
I don't know what happened.
I played a game on one of my other accounts, logged off, then tried logging into this one and I've been getting this error when trying to login with either accounts. I don't know what to do, any solutions? Should I just reinstall? Or is there a way to save my time?
I have the rar of logs, I'll have a link uploaded with it in dropbox.

replies.body: That error makes it sound like your network wasn't able to get a signal from the login queues, which is pretty weird considering you said you were playing right before trying to switch accounts. Do me a favor really quickly and try connecting with an ethernet connection after turning off your firewall/antivirus. Sometimes they have been known to block access to our servers for strange reasons, but definitely hit me back if that doesn't help.
